[Instructions For Submitting A Game]


Step 1. Fill in the form above.
Step 2. Click the "Save HTML!" button, this will generate the HTML page for your game.
Step 3. Email the generated HTML file to [play@flaswf.tk]. You can either copy the source text of the HTML file as the email content, or attach the HTML file. Please use a relevant email title/subject like "Game Submission" or something similar.


[Frequently Asked Questions]


What kind of games do you accept?

All kinds of games.


Who can submit a game?

Anyone. You can either be the developer/author of the game, or just a fun for a game. Just submit your creations, or recommend your favourites!


Where can I get the source code for the page generating tool?

Yes, the page generating tool - HTMLWebCreator is open source. You can find the source code at http://bruce-lab.blogspot.com/2013/10/simple-html-page-creator-in-as3.html.


Will my submission be rejected?

No. All submissions will be accepted. There will be no rejection except for those viloating the TOS. However, only the best games can be published on the front page. All others will go to the archive page.


Any questions regarding game submission or about the page generating tool, please email to: [play@flaswf.tk]
